## TargetGroup type

Represents the data of a Target Group: used to target an audience based on certain conditions.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type TargetGroup = RepositoryLocalObject & {
    Conditions?: Array<Condition>;
    Description?: string;
};
```

**References:** [RepositoryLocalObject](./open-api-client.repositorylocalobject.md)<!-- -->, [Condition](./open-api-client.condition.md)
